verb.definition: Give one's attention to a sound.
verb.example: Sit and listen to the music.

verb.definition: Take notice of and act on what someone says; respond to advice or a request.
verb.example: I told him to stop, but he wouldn't listen.

noun.definition: An act of listening to something.
noun.example: Have a listen to this track.

usage_examples: Please listen carefully to the instructions.
She loves to listen to podcasts.
